entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers or thunderstorms. Low 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or thunderstorms this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h except 60 gusting to 80 near thunderstorms this evening. Wind becoming light near midnight. Low 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Showers or thunderstorms. High 20.
entry.summary: A few showers ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or thunderstorms. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High 20. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the evening. A few showers beginning near midnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 4 May 2023
